price: (yaitu) surga ʻAdn yang mereka masuk ke dalamnya; mengalir di bawahnya sungai-sungai; di dalam surga itu mereka mendapat segala apa yang mereka kehendaki.  Demikianlah Allah memberi balasan kepada orang-orang yang bertakwa,
arabic: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ يَدۡخُلُونَهَا تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَجۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: jannātu ʿadnin yadkhulūnahā tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru lahum fīhā mā yashāūna kadhālika yajzī al-lahu al-mutaqīna
